newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Hershey rating raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Hershey rating raised.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securites Inc said Friday it raised its rating on Hershey Foods Corp to a long-term outperform from market perform. Its intermediate term rating remains market perform.

-- "Promising new products, regular market share gains in both confectionery and pasta, tighter expense controls and aggressive stock repurchases are important elements of the brighter outlook at Hershey," EVEREN said in a report.
-- Earnings per share estimates are $3.95 for 1996 and $4.40 for 1997.
-- The six-month price objective is $94 a share and 18-month objective is $108, on a pre-split basis.
